content:
Understood, here's your meal plan:

Day 1:

* Breakfast: Gluten-free yogurt bowl with 150g of Greek yogurt, 100g of mixed berries, and 30g of gluten-free granola. Total calories: approximately 400.
* Lunch: Grilled chicken breast (150g) with roasted vegetables (200g) and quinoa (100g). Total calories: approximately 550.
* Dinner: Grilled salmon (150g) with a mixed green salad (200g) and sweet potato (100g). Total calories: approximately 550.
* Snack: Apple (100g) and 30g of almond butter. Total calories: approximately 250.

Day 2:

* Breakfast: Scrambled eggs (2) with spinach (50g) and cherry tomatoes (50g), and gluten-free toast (2 slices). Total calories: approximately 400.
* Lunch: Grilled turkey (150g) with brown rice (100g) and steamed broccoli (200g). Total calories: approximately 550.
* Dinner: Grilled steak (150g) with roasted mushrooms (100g) and a mixed green salad (200g). Total calories: approximately 550.
* Snack: Carrots (100g) and hummus (30g). Total calories: approximately 150.

Day 3:

* Breakfast: Gluten-free pancakes with 100g of mixed berries and a drizzle of maple syrup. Total calories: approximately 400.
* Lunch: Grilled shrimp (150g) with a quinoa and black bean salad (200g). Total calories: approximately 550.
* Dinner: Grilled chicken fajitas (150g) with peppers (100g) and onions (100g) on a gluten-free tortilla. Total calories: approximately 550.
* Snack: Rice crackers (30g) with avocado (100g). Total calories: approximately 250.

Please let me know if you'd like to make any changes to your meal plan.
